description: Recommended MCP servers for the macOS – Apple Platforms & Tooling profile.

recommended_usage: Audit dependencies for security, license, and maintenance risk.
Guide safer dependency choices during code generation and reviews.
Monitor CocoaPods, Swift Package Manager, and Homebrew inputs for stale or vulnerable artifacts.

config_fragments.notes: Refer to Sonatype docs for the latest CLI/binary path, pass credentials via env vars (e.g. SONATYPE_TOKEN=<TO_FILL>), and avoid sending private app names when operating outside trusted sandboxes.

recommended_usage: Fetch versioned, up-to-date library and framework docs.
Disambiguate APIs across versions during coding and review.

config_fragments.notes: Requires Context7 token/config (e.g. CONTEXT7_API_KEY=<TO_FILL>); treat as cloud-hosted and disable when handling sensitive IP.

recommended_usage: Browse repos, issues, and pull requests from within the agent.
Trigger safe workflow automation during reviews.
